pl.ais.commons.bean.validation

Class Constraint<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.ais.commons.bean.validation.Constraint<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - determines the type of constrainable value
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Specification<Constrainable<V>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AllConstraint, AnyConstraint, EmptyConstraint, NotBlankConstraint, RequiredConstraint, ValidEmailConstraint

    public class Constraint<V>
extends Object
implements Specification<Constrainable<V>>
    Base class for all constraints.
    Since:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    Warlock, AIS.PL
